price: ߣߌߡߊ ߘߏ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߝߏߦߌ߫ ߡߙߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߣߌߡߊ߫ ߜߘߍ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߠߋ߬ ، ߥߊߟߋߦߊ ߓߍ߯ ߖߍ߬ߘߍ ߦߋ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߓߏߟߴߏ߬ ߟߏ߲
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسٞ لِّنَفۡسٖ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā tamliku nafsun linafsin shayan wal-amru yawma-idhin lillahi
